General.Name: EID Parry India Limited
General.Description: E.I.D.- Parry (India) Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture and sale of sugar, nutraceuticals, and sanitizer products in India, North America, Europe, and internationally. The company offers sugar for use in food, bakery, confectioneries, beverage, and pharmaceutical industries; and grains, such as millets and dhals, as well as rice. It also provides nutraceuticals products, such as organic spirulina and chlorella, carotenoid, astaxanthin, and lutein and zeaxanthin; and distillery products in various forms, including rectified sprit, extra neutral alcohol, ethanol, etc. In addition, the company offers hand sanitization products; and generates and sells approximately 140 MW of power for state electricity grids and third parties. E.I.D.- Parry (India) Limited was founded in 1788 and is headquartered in Chennai, India.
